item.title: Can you make me a map? Making Louisiana’s cultural resources records accessible
item.description:
Rachel Watson

In October of 2004 the Louisiana Department of Culture, Recreation and Tourism, Office of Cultural Development (OCD) and the LA Department of Transportation and Development (DOTD) signed an interagency agreement to develop a comprehensive statewide cultural resources GIS system, the Louisiana Cultural Resources Map. The State Historic Preservation …
item.dc:creator: Rachel Watson

item.title: Can you make me a map? Making Louisiana’s cultural resources records accessible
item.description:
Rachel Watson

This paper will outline the processes and decisions that the Louisiana Division of Archaeology made to create an efficient, comprehensive GIS system that could be utilized by both professionals and the citizenry of Louisiana to help promote both progress and preservation. I will discuss how we partnered with …
